function.name: LSGetLitestepPath
function.description: Gets the path to the LiteStep directory.

parameter.name: pszBuffer
parameter.description: Buffer that receives the path. If the path is too large to fit in the buffer, it is truncated.

parameter.name: cchBuffer
parameter.description: Size of the buffer in characters.

return.description: If the path is retrieved successfully, the return value is nonzero. If an error occurs, the return value is zero.

remarks.p: The LiteStep directory is where the main LiteStep executable (litestep.exe) resides.
